text: Gorontalo is a city and the capital of the Gorontalo Province, Indonesia. It is on the island of Sulawesi. The city has an area of 64.79 kmÂ² and a population of 179,991 at the 2010 Census.Biro Pusat Statistik, Jakarta, 2011. ==Notes== Category:Cities in Indonesia Category:Gorontalo
title: Gorontalo (city)
